title: Wine Quality Prediction using MLOps
features: Engineered an end‑to‑end MLOps pipeline for wine quality prediction, automating data ingestion, validation, transformation, training, and deployment via Docker and FastAPI.
Implemented MLflow experiment tracking and hyperparameter optimization, boosting model accuracy by 15% over baseline.
Designed a flexible configuration and logging system using Hydra and Loguru, ensuring reproducible, scalable deployments across CI/CD workflows.
